text: :bulb: IDEA: add multiselect logic to custom modules
Hey John, can you provide a quick use case for what you could build with this? (Feel free to DM if its something client wise you can’t open talk about)
Imagine you have 7+ fields like this. You could throw in a multi select field that would give users less “choice fatigue”.
Can you post this in the Ideas forum and then post the link in here?
Also would this display as a checkbox type thing or a dropdown where you can select multiple options (much like with tags selection in blogs) ?
will do, it would display either like the multiselect option in hubdb or like some of the link options

Browser push notifications (native) for blog posts:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Browser-Push-Notifications-for-Blog-Posts/idi-p/295810#M43296>
